quote: Hell man, I know very well you didn't come to me only to want to become a writer, and after all what do I really know about it except that you've got to stick to it with the energy of a benny addict.
quote_letters: HELL MAN I KNOW VERY WELL YOU DIDNT COME TO ME ONLY TO WANT TO BECOME A WRITER AND AFTER ALL WHAT DO I REALLY KNOW ABOUT IT EXCEPT THAT YOUVE GOT TO STICK TO IT WITH THE ENERGY OF A BENNY ADDICT
